title: Will Triathlon Über-Trainer Olav Aleksander Bu Transform Cycling Thinking in Role at Uno-X?
content:
'Double threshold' training pioneer set to join Scandinavian team as his athlete Blummenfelt blames salary gap for aborting Tour de France project.

Read the full article at Will Triathlon Über-Trainer Olav Aleksander Bu Transform Cycling Thinking in Role at Uno-X? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
